CustomField.description: Garth James - 10.11.2016 - created to store which SSO Configuration will be used for this group of settings. Note that SAML provisioning will itself already know which SSO Configuration it has been invoked through - this has just been created to support that for integrity checks and testing
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores which SSO Configuration will be used for this group of settings. Note that SAML provisioning will itself already know which SSO Configuration it has been invoked through - this exists to support integrity checks and testing.
CustomField.label: SSO Configuration Name
